column5: Thought you all would like to hear a good news story.  I ordered a new Mr Heater MH15C from Gagnons website Tuesday night. Wed I get a call because the shipping charge didn't get added in. No problem they will cover it. It showed up at my door via Canada post Thursday morning.  Fast & Courteous Service, Kudos to Gagnons! Ted
I guess there is a first time for everything!!!  S.
Now that's funny!  Glad to hear you had some good luck there Ted!
Ted! My brother from another mother!!!!!! Good to see you here... and thanks for letting us know about good customer service... we need to hear the good stuff to, sometimes... HH
